code_quality_guarantee.contributor_count_desc: Determine how many active pr creators, code reviewers, commit authors there are in the past 90 days.
code_quality_guarantee.commit_frequency_desc: Determine the average number of commits per week in the past 90 days.
code_quality_guarantee.is_maintained_desc: Percentage of weeks with at least one code commit in the past 90 days(single repository). Percentage of code repositories with at least one code commit in the last 30 days(multiple repositories).
code_quality_guarantee.commit_pr_linked_ratio_desc: Determine the percentage of new code commit link pull request in the last 90 days.
code_quality_guarantee.pr_issue_linked_ratio_desc: Determine the percentage of new pull request link issues in the last 90 days.
code_quality_guarantee.code_review_ratio_desc: Determine the percentage of code commits with at least one reviewer (not PR creator) in the last 90 days.
code_quality_guarantee.code_merge_ratio_desc: Determine the percentage of PR Mergers and PR authors who are not the same person in the last 90 days of commits.
code_quality_guarantee.lines_of_code_frequency_desc: Determine the average number of lines touched (lines added plus lines removed) per week in the past 90 days.

community_service_and_support.updated_issues_count_desc: Determine the number of issues updated in the last 90 days.
community_service_and_support.close_pr_count_desc: The number of PR accepted and declined in the last 90 days.
community_service_and_support.issue_first_response_desc: Average/Median first comments response (in days) for new issues created in the last 90 days. This excludes bot responses, the creator's own comment, or an action assigned by the issue. If the issue has been unanswered, the first response time is not counted.
community_service_and_support.bug_issue_open_time_desc: Average/Median time (days) that bug issues have been opened for issues created in the last 90 days.
community_service_and_support.pr_open_time_desc: Average/Median processing time (days) for new change requests created in the last 90 days, including closed/accepted change requests and unresolved change requests.
community_service_and_support.comment_frequency_desc: Determine the average number of comments per issue created in the last 90 days.
community_service_and_support.code_review_count_desc: Determine the average number of review comments per pull request created in the last 90 days.

community_activity.contributor_count_desc: Determine how many active code commit authors, pr authors, review participants, issue authors, and issue comments participants there are in the past 90 days.
community_activity.commit_frequency_desc: Determine the average number of commits per week in the past 90 days.
community_activity.updated_since_desc: Determine the average time per repository since the repository was last updated (in months).
community_activity.organization_count_desc: Number of organizations to which active code contributors belong in the past 90 days.
community_activity.created_since_desc: Determine how long a repository has existed since it was created (in months).
community_activity.comment_frequency_desc: Determine the average number of comments per issue created in the last 90 days.
community_activity.code_review_count_desc: Determine the average number of review comments per pull request created in the last 90 days.
community_activity.updated_issues_count_desc: Determine the number of issues updated in the last 90 days.
community_activity.recent_releases_count_desc: Determine the number of releases in the last year.

organization_activity.org_count_desc: Number of organizations to which active code contributors belong in the past 90 days.
organization_activity.contributor_count_desc: Number of active code contributors with organization affiliation in the past 90 days.
organization_activity.commit_frequency_desc: Definition: Determine the average number of commits with organization affiliation per week in the past 90 days.
organization_activity.contribution_last_desc: Total contribution time of all organizations to the community in the past 90 days (weeks).
